name: Janky Jumble
description:
Janky Jumble.  Build the tallest tower you can with the worst building materials you can think of! Cows, TVs, eggs, cats, and more! Try to get the highest score in this physics based micro arcade game and gain the stacking skills of a god.  It may be janky, but can it stand?  Find out in Janky Jumble.

Controls:

  • Keyboard
    • WASD ........................... Move
  • Gamepad 
    • Left Stick .................. Move

Credits:

  • Programmer: Stephanie Becerra |  GitHub
  • Programmer: Everette Webber | GitHub
  • Artist: Lindsay Pimentel | ArtStation
  • Sound Designer: Leo Cazares | SoundCloud

Additional Assets:

  • Cat - printable_models
  • Egg - pepnudl
  • Companion Cube - Valve (exported by slandey)
  • Skybox - Render Knight
